text: * Union: * map(t) = <t, t> * Reduce: <t, [t]> = <t, t>and <t [t, t]> = <t, t> * Intersection: * map(t) = <t, t> « reduce: <t, [t, t]> = <t, t>and <t, [t]> = nothing * Difference R — S: « map:t = <t,R>fortinRandt —<t,S>fortin S « reduce: produce <t, t> if value list is [R], otherwise produce nothing
